data.name: Deluxe Upgrade for Shadowrun Chronicles
data.detailed_description:
This upgrades your regular edition Shadowrun Chronicles game to the cool Deluxe Edition



This upgrade will expand your game with the Infected! Add-on and provide a lot of cool extra items, weapons and armour which help you get an edge on the streets PLUS

  • Listen to the music inspired by Shadowrun Chronicles on the bonus soundtrack!
  • Did you always want to try the Shadowrun Tabletop game? The Quick Start Rules give you an introduction to the world and the ruleset of the game. Gather your friends around the table and slip into the Shadows with them!
  • The Boston Adventures bring the Boston Lockdown scenario to your Shadowrun Tabletop group! Get intel on the Boston setting and play a run inspired by the Shadowrun Chronicles: Boston Lockdown Campaign!
data.about_the_game:
This upgrades your regular edition Shadowrun Chronicles game to the cool Deluxe Edition



This upgrade will expand your game with the Infected! Add-on and provide a lot of cool extra items, weapons and armour which help you get an edge on the streets PLUS

  • Listen to the music inspired by Shadowrun Chronicles on the bonus soundtrack!
  • Did you always want to try the Shadowrun Tabletop game? The Quick Start Rules give you an introduction to the world and the ruleset of the game. Gather your friends around the table and slip into the Shadows with them!
  • The Boston Adventures bring the Boston Lockdown scenario to your Shadowrun Tabletop group! Get intel on the Boston setting and play a run inspired by the Shadowrun Chronicles: Boston Lockdown Campaign!
data.short_description: This upgrades your regular edition Shadowrun Chronicles game to the cool Deluxe Edition, grants you the next campaign expansion for free as well as a mountain of in game items, 45 minutes of soundtrack and exclusive tabletop adventures and starter rules.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Online Gameplay- Requires internet connection to play
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/Windows 8.1
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Online Gameplay- Requires internet connection to play

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 + (doesnt work on 10.13 High Sierra and higher)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GH or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Online Gameplay- Requires internet connection to play
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.7 + (doesnt work on 10.13 High Sierra and higher)
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Online Gameplay- Requires internet connection to play

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card with dedicated drivers
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card with dedicated drivers
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires internet connection to play
